plot: Ghost bounty hunters kidnap Dana in an effort to bait Midnight Daisy, a vengeful spirit who defends women in despair.
title: Midnight Daisy
plot_es: Ghost bounty hunters kidnap Dana in an effort to bait Midnight Daisy, a vengeful spirit who defends women in despair.
plot_en: Ghost bounty hunters kidnap Dana in an effort to bait Midnight Daisy, a vengeful spirit who defends women in despair.
